title: Add Zurich-focused online couples counseling landing page at /paarberatung-zuerich (not in main navigation)

requirements.text: Create a new landing page route at `/paarberatung-zuerich` that renders a dedicated landing page for `paarweg.com/paarberatung-zuerich` (German copy), targeting couples from Zurich seeking online couples counseling/coaching, and ensure this page is reachable by direct URL.

quotes: Erstelle eine ruhige, vertrauensvolle und klare Landingpage für paarweg.com.

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to `/paarberatung-zuerich` renders the new landing page.
The page uses the existing global `Layout` (header/footer) and existing UI components (Button/Card/etc.) to match the current site styling.

requirements.text: Implement the landing page content and section structure with a calm, respectful, reflective tone (no hype), matching the existing `paarweg.com` style; explicitly mention Zurich clearly even though the service is online. Use the provided headline and subheadline verbatim.

quotes: Headline: „Paarberatung Zürich – online neue Wege für eure Beziehung finden“
Subheadline: Online-Paarberatung & Coaching für Paare aus Zürich – flexibel, diskret, persönlich
Ton & Stil: – ruhig – wertschätzend – reflektiert – keine reißerischen Versprechen – nahbar, aber professionell
Fokus auf Beziehung, Kommunikation, neue Wege, gemeinsame Entwicklung

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section contains the exact headline: “Paarberatung Zürich – online neue Wege für eure Beziehung finden”.
Hero section contains the exact subheadline: “Online-Paarberatung & Coaching für Paare aus Zürich – flexibel, diskret, persönlich”.

Page includes distinct sections for: (1) typical couple challenges (e.g., stuck conversations, distance, conflicts), (2) how online counseling works at PaarWeg, (3) PaarWeg attitude/approach (appreciative, solution-oriented, on equal footing), (4) CTA invitation to an initial, non-binding first contact.
Copy avoids exaggerated promises and is consistent with the calm professional tone used on existing pages.

requirements.text: Add a clear primary Call-to-Action on the landing page that invites visitors to request an initial non-binding first contact, using existing contact/booking options already used on the site (e.g., link to `/kontakt` and/or the existing Calendly URL).

quotes: Call-to-Action: Einladung zu einem unverbindlichen Erstkontakt
Ziel: Besucher sollen sich verstanden fühlen und eine Kontaktanfrage stellen.

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page includes a prominent CTA button above the fold and at least one CTA repetition near the bottom.
At least one CTA takes the user to an existing conversion path (e.g., `/kontakt` and/or `https://calendly.com/paarweg-info`) without introducing new third-party integrations.

requirements.text: Ensure the landing page is not linked from the main header navigation or mobile menu (no new entry added to the `navigation` list in `frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx`).

quotes: Die seite soll nicht im Menu verlinkt sein, sondern nur als LAndingpage dienen.

acceptanceCriteria: Header desktop navigation and mobile navigation show no link to `/paarberatung-zuerich`.
The page remains accessible via direct URL entry.

requirements.text: Add SEO metadata for `/paarberatung-zuerich` consistent with existing pages: set `document.title`, meta description, canonical URL (`https://www.paarweg.com/paarberatung-zuerich`), and Open Graph tags that reflect the Zurich-focused online service.

quotes: Zürich soll klar genannt werden, obwohl das Angebot online ist

acceptanceCriteria: `document.title` is set on mount and includes “Paarberatung Zürich” and “PaarWeg”.
A meta description exists and references Zurich + online couples counseling/coaching + discreet/confidential/professional positioning.
Open Graph tags (`og:title`, `og:description`, `og:url`) exist and match the page topic.

requirements.text: Update `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` to include `https://www.paarweg.com/paarberatung-zuerich` as an indexable URL entry (while still keeping it unlinked from the menu).

quotes: Die seite soll nicht im Menu verlinkt sein, sondern nur als LAndingpage dienen.

acceptanceCriteria: Existing sitemap entries remain valid XML and unchanged aside from the new addition and an appropriate `lastmod` value for the new entry.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose using existing components only).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for this landing page.
nonGoals: Building a new backend contact-form workflow (email sending, database, CRM integrations).
Adding the landing page to the main menu navigation.
Implementing third-party authentication or additional analytics/integrations beyond what already exists.
